review: Very slow! Sent it back after 2 weeks of freezing, pausing, and the longest start up time every single time you turn on TV!
author: Kevin Charles

review: Does NOT support using WPS-protected auto connection for using push-button network connection on routers. I contacted Roku and there is no way to connect using WPS anyhow, you have to use basic no-protection or other simple type-in PIN or password protected network setup to use this product. I was not about to redo a network that has notebook, printer, tablet and phone using it for wifi connections with internet, all working nice and smoothly, just because Roku didn't think to use the protocol that's been available for years. Had to send it back, will not be using Roku products anytime soon.
